description.lang: Fifthplays Advanced Home Area Manager allows consumers to deploy new value-added services by connecting all kinds of devices and technologies in their digital home.Modular hardware platform, customizable and extendible by means of bricks (hardware building blocks) and USB interfaces to support various protocols and devices. Modular software platform, with remote software upgradeable and support functions.Easy and intuitive installation and configuration.Broadband internet connection.Remote access for the customer via Web and Smartphone APPs.
